title: Establishes guidelines for determining the responsibility of a bidder or subcontractor
summary: Requires state agencies and public authorities to give due consideration to credible evidence or reliable information related to the responsibility, reliability or character of a public contract bidder; provides that contractors or subcontractors who have been determined not to be a responsible bidder will be given reasonable notice and an opportunity to be heard, and may appeal the contracting agency's decision to the head of such agency.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing guidelines for determining the responsibility of a bidder or subcontractor
